WizardTD.Wavemanage

类 Wave

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Wavemanage.Wave

  • public class Wave
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Wave

        public Wave(double waves_pre_wave_pause,
            double waves_duration,
            java.lang.String waves_pre_monsters_type,
            double waves_pre_monsters_hp,
            double waves_pre_monsters_speed,
            double waves_pre_monsters_armour,
            double waves_pre_monsters_mana_gained_on_kill,
            int waves_pre_monsters_quantity,
            Mana mana)
        The constructor of wave,the class use to control the number of monsters and time for each current wave.
        参数:
        waves_pre_wave_pause - The duration of the pre-wave pause.
        waves_duration - The duration of the wave itself.
        waves_pre_monsters_type - The type of monsters for the wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_hp - The health points (hp) of monsters for the wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_speed - The speed of monsters for the wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_armour - The armor of monsters for the wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_mana_gained_on_kill - The amount of mana gained when killing monsters in the wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_quantity - The quantity of monsters in the wave.
        mana - The mana resource used for controlling the wave.

        public double getWaves_pre_wave_pause()
        Retrieves the duration of the pre-wave pause.

        public double getWaves_duration()
        Retrieves the duration of the wave itself.
        返回:
        The duration of the wave.

      • getWaves_pre_monsters_quantity

        public int getWaves_pre_monsters_quantity()
        Retrieves the quantity of monsters in the wave.
        返回:
